net.sf.jclec.base

Class FilteredRecombinator

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jclec.base.DecoratedRecombinator
      • net.sf.jclec.base.FilteredRecombinator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, IConfigure, IRecombinator, ITool, JCLEC

    public class FilteredRecombinator
extends DecoratedRecombinator
    Filtered recombinator. Recombines individuals with a given recombination probability.
    Author:
    Sebastian Ventura
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
